operations.summary: Get the list of Physical Hosts.
operations.notes: Get the list of Physical Hosts configured in the cluster.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of Physical Hosts to retrieve

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on any Host.
Get the list of events generated on any Host.
Get the health check summary for Hosts.

responseMessages.message: Any internal exception while performing this operation

operations.notes: Get a Physical Host with the specified id.

operations.summary: Get the list of alerts generated on a specified Host.
Get the list of events generated on a specified Host.
Get the stats for a specified Physical Host.
operations.notes: If start time and end time are included in the query string, then historical stats are retrieved. Otherwise, the latest stats are retrieved.

responseMessages.message: Any internal exception while performing this operation

actions.description: Possible actions to resolve this alert

chartQueries.description: Charts that are relevant to this cause

hasGlobalDetails.description: Whether the alert has global details or not

numResolvedCount.description: Number of times this cause has resolved the alert

parentCauseId.description: Id of the alert/cause this is a possible cause for

troubleshootingSteps.description: Steps to determine whether this is the cause.

severity.description: This field describes the severity of the alert.

metricDetails.description: List of metric details associated with the alert
metricDetails.notes: List of metric details associated with the alert

severityTrails.description: List that contains severity level change details
severityTrails.notes: List that contains severity level change details

comparisonOperator.description: Comparison Operator to be applied for teh values.

conditionType.description: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.
conditionType.notes: Condition Type that the current metric is associated with.

metricValueDetails.description: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle
metricValueDetails.notes: List of metric values at different instances of time in the alert lifecycle

metricThresholdValue.description: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.
metricThresholdValue.notes: Threshold value of the metric that was specified in the policy at that given time.

metricValue.description: Actual value of the metric at that given time.
metricValue.notes: Actual value of the metric at that given time.

stateChangeTimeStampInUsecs.description: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.
stateChangeTimeStampInUsecs.notes: Time at which the alert's state change occurred.

severity.description: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL
severity.notes: Severity level of the alert. Can be INFO, WARNING or CRITICAL

severityChangeTimestampInUsecs.description: Time at which the severity level change occurred
severityChangeTimestampInUsecs.notes: Time at which the severity level change occurred

biosModel.description: Specifies the model of bios, present on the node

biosVersion.description: Specifies the version of bios, present on the node

bmcModel.description: Specifies the model of bmc, present on the node

bmcVersion.description: Specifies the version of bmc, present on the node

defaultVhdContainerId.description: Specifies the ID of the Nutanix container if the default location for storing virtual hard disk files on the Hyper-V node happens to be a Nutanix container.

defaultVhdContainerUuid.description: Specifies the UUID of the Nutanix container if the default location for storing virtual hard disk files on the Hyper-V node happens to be a Nutanix container.

defaultVhdLocation.description: The default location configured on the Hyper-V node for storing virtual hard disk files.

defaultVmContainerId.description: Specifies the Id of the Nutanix container if the default location for storing virtual machine configuration files on the Hyper-V node happens to be a Nutanix container.

defaultVmContainerUuid.description: Specifies the UUID of the Nutanix container if the default location for storing virtual machine configuration files on the Hyper-V node happens to be a Nutanix container.

defaultVmLocation.description: The default location configured on the Hyper-V node for storing virtual machine configuration files.

diskHardwareConfigs.description: The disk hardware configurations. This field is not applicable if fetched from PC.

failoverClusterFqdn.description: The name of the Hyper-V failover cluster that this node is a part of. Applies only if the node runs Hyper-V

failoverClusterNodeState.description: If this node runs Hyper-V and is part of a failovercluster, this property specifies the state of the nodein the failover cluster.

gpuDriverVersion.description: Host driver version of the GPUs.

hbaFirmwaresList.description: Specifies the version and model info of the hba, present on the node

rebootPending.description: If this node runs Hyper-V, this property indicates that a reboot is pending for the earlier initiated domain joining to be complete.

hbaModel.description: Specifies the model of hba, present on the node

hbaVersion.description: Specifies the version of hba, present on the node
